Action.author: scottz
Action.body: Rajesh, we would like to assign this to you; the 2nd error msg was introduced with your sidedb changeset for the anchorpeers channel config updates. The first error msg has been there awhile, but we just figured out the root cause today. We triaged and propose solutions to both errors, so I am sure you could do this very quickly. Thanks!

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: This bug is not BLOCKing any CI tests, but fixing as described would certainly reduce clutter in the stdout/stderr logs which would allow people to focus on the true problems and aid debugging efforts.
